text.name: {0}UserInOrganizationUnitsListedAboveError
text.value: User can not be deleted until they are first removed from the Organizaton Unit(s) listed above.

text.name: InvalidFormMessage
text.value: Your form is invalid. Please check and correct it.

text.name: ThereIsNoTenantDefinedWithName{0}
text.value: There is no client defined with name {0}

text.name: UserIsNotActiveAndCanNotLogin
text.value: User {0} is not active and can not log in.

text.name: RoleDeleteWarningMessage
text.value: Role {0} will be deleted and unassigned from all assigned users.

text.name: ResetPermissionsTooltip
text.value: This button immediately resets user specific permission settings and saves changes. The user will only have permissions from assigned roles.

text.name: ThisWebSiteRootAddress_Hint
text.value: It will be used when building links to this web site. It's needed for some tasks like building password reset links. Ex: http://mydomain.com/

text.name: SendPasswordResetLink_Information
text.value: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.name: InvalidUserNameOrEmailAddress
text.value: Invalid user name or email address

text.name: PasswordResetEmail_SubTitle
text.value: This email is sent you to reset and re-create your password.

text.name: PasswordResetEmail_ClickTheLinkBelowToResetYourPassword
text.value: Please click the link below to reset your password:

text.name: EmailActivation_SubTitle
text.value: This email is sent you to verify your email.

text.name: EmailActivation_ClickTheLinkBelowToVerifyYourEmail
text.value: Please click the link below to verify your email address:

text.name: InvalidPasswordResetCode_Detail
text.value: Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this not solves the problem, you can re-try to request a new password reset link.

text.name: UserEmailIsNotConfirmedAndCanNotLogin
text.value: Your email address is not confirmed. Please check your email and click the email confirmation link to activate your account. If you did not receive activation email, click the 'email confirmation' to request a new email.

text.name: InvalidEmailConfirmationCode_Detail
text.value: Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this not solves the problem, you can re-try to request a new confirmation code.

text.name: YourEmailIsConfirmedMessage
text.value: Your email address is successfully confirmed.

text.name: ShouldChangePasswordOnNextLogin
text.value: Should change password on next login.

text.name: SendEmailActivationLink_Information
text.value: A link will be sent to your email to activate your email address. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.name: SelfUserRegistrationIsDisabledMessage
text.value: You can not register to the system!

text.name: SelfUserRegistrationIsDisabledMessage_Detail
text.value: Self user registration is disabled. Please contact to the system administrator to register.

text.name: ConfirmationMailSentPleaseClickLinkInTheEmail
text.value: A confirmation mail sent to {0}. Please click link in the email in order to confirm your mail address.

text.name: YourAccountIsWaitingToBeActivatedByAdmin
text.value: Your account is waiting to be activated by system admin.

text.name: AllowUsersToRegisterThemselves
text.value: Allow users to register to the system.

text.name: AllowUsersToRegisterThemselves_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, users will only be added by admin using user management page.

text.name: NewRegisteredUsersIsActiveByDefault
text.value: New registered users are active by default.

text.name: NewRegisteredUsersIsActiveByDefault_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, new users will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activate the account.

text.name: DefaultRole_Description
text.value: Assign to new users as default.

text.name: StaticRole_Tooltip
text.value: Static roles can not be deleted.

text.value: Client name can not be empty

text.name: TenantName_Regex_Description
text.value: Client name must be at least 2 chars, starts with a letter and continue with letter, number, dash or underscore. This will become their unique URL.
